headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  AIELLO, DOMINICK J

lead_paragraph: AIELLO--Dominick J. August 31, 2014. Beloved husband of the late Mary. Devoted father of Vincent, Rosann, Dominick and the late Raymond. Dear grandfather of Riccardo, Serena, Daniel and Jon-Michael. Great-grandfather of Yusuf, Gianna Rose, Miriam, Henry and Francesca. Loving Brother of Anthony, Peter, Orlando and Susan. Reposing at Perazzo Funeral Home, 199 Bleecker Street, New York City, Mass of Christian Burial Thursday 10:30am, St. Anthony's Church. Entombment Trinity Church Mausoleum. Friends may call Wednesday 2-5pm and 7-9pm. In lieu of flowers, donations to the Prostate Cancer Foundation, www.pcf.org, would be appreciated. For online condolences please visit us at: perazzofuneralhome.com
